SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.protocol

Class CommunicationHandler

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.protocol.CommunicationHandler
public class CommunicationHandler extends Object
Class that handles the communication between the nodes. It sends and receives messages from the multicast group.

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message) throws Exception
      Send a message to the multicast group

      The message is sent as a byte array

      Parameters:
      message - Message to send
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while sending the message

    • sendMessage

      Parameters:
